mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( username, mb_password, mb_nickname, mb_pnumber, role, mb_date, mb_icon ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{mb_password}, #{mb_nickname}, #{mb_pnumber}, #{role}, NOW(), '/images/default.png' )
mapper.update:
UPDATE member
mb_password = #{mb_password},
mb_nickname = #{mb_nickname},
mb_pnumber = #{mb_pnumber},
mb_icon = #{mb_icon},
WHERE mb_uid = #{mb_uid}
mapper.select: SELECT h.hist_uid, h.hist_score, h.hist_date, e.ex_title, e.ex_level, l.ex_lang_name FROM exam_history h INNER JOIN exam e ON h.ex_uid = e.ex_uid AND h.ex_lang_uid = e.ex_lang_uid INNER JOIN exam_language l ON h.ex_lang_uid = l.ex_lang_uid WHERE h.mb_uid = #{mb_uid} ORDER BY h.hist_date DESC
SELECT * FROM interview_history WHERE mb_uid = #{mb_uid} ORDER BY iv_date DESC, iv_uid ASC
